title: Cherry poppy seed loaf cake
ingredients: ['120g plain flour', '70g spelt flour', '2 tablespoons poppy seeds', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '200g natural yoghurt', '150g caster sugar', '120ml sunflower or olive oil', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '275g pitted and halved cherries']
